oai_dc:dc.dc:title: U-Compare Cafetiere English Sentence Detector
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The purpose of the tool is to detect sentence boundaries in English text. The tool is provided as a UIMA component, specifically as Java archive (jar) file, which can be incorporated within any UIMA workflow. However, it is particularly designed use in the U-Compare text mining platform (see separate META-SHARE record), since the types of annotations it produces are compliant with the U-Compare.
